name: Shielded Sorcerer
text_description: The Shielded Sorcerer is known for his powerful defenses. When in play, all other Arcane type cards gain +2 defense.
illustration_description: A wise-looking sorcerer, ensconced within a shining magical shield, stands amidst a library filled with arcane knowledge. In his hands, he holds an ancient staff radiating with arcane energy. The background is illuminated by glowing runes and mystical symbols.
